TextView.android:text: Telly and the Tale of the Four Seasons is a 16 level season themed platform game. To complete a level, the player needs to collect three coins over the course of the level. Sometimes however Telly gets lucky and god gives her a coin out of pity. Upon collection of the final coin, the player will be prompted to continue to the next level or return to the main menu. Telly will get air-dropped into the level DO NOT click anything until she reaches the ground or there will be a chance she dies. To play the game, the player must use the arrows to move Telly in the desired direction. Telly however has a bad knee and will sometimes jump short. Keep jumping until she makes it or she'll be really sad you gave up on her.
